movies.title: Inception
movies.synopsis: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

movies.title: Redemption
movies.synopsis: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.synopsis: When the menace known as The Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

movies.title: OMG
movies.synopsis: When the menace known as The Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.synopsis: A computer programmer discovers a mysterious world beneath the digital reality that he thought he knew.

movies.title: Jurassic Park
movies.synopsis: A group of people must survive a deadly island inhabited by dinosaurs.

movies.title: Gabbar Singh
movies.synopsis: Crazy police officer in a small village confronts a gangstar and closes his case is a single line story of Gabbar singh

movies.title: Avatar
movies.synopsis: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.synopsis: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

movies.title: Lord of the Rings
movies.synopsis: A young hobbit sets out on a journey to destroy a powerful ring and save Middle-earth from the dark lord Sauron.

movies.title: The Knight Rises
movies.synopsis: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman must return to defend Gotham City against the mysterious villain Bane.

reviews.review: Epic conclusion to Nolan's Batman trilogy
reviews.name: batfan

movies.title: Jailer
movies.synopsis: Muthuvel Pandian is a strict yet empathetic jailer who sets out to stop a gang from trying to rescue their leader from the prison.

reviews.review: From the get-go, Jailer announces its intentions: it's an unapologetic action extravaganza. Rajnikanth, in his signature style, brings his larger-than-life presence to the screen, ensuring there's never a dull moment. The opening scenes had me wondering if I was in for a déjà vu of Vikram, but just as I thought I had the movie pegged, it pulled a genre switch that left me both impressed and intrigued.
reviews.name: balajimurali
